section.p: This is a program to read electronic books in a number of formats: EPUB, FB2, RTF, TXT, HTML, CHM, PDB, MOBI, TCR
Save books to read on your device internal memory or SD card and open them using Cool Reader.
As well you can download books from online OPDS catalogs directly from Cool Reader.
This is a port of Android version. Not all features of Android versions are implemented yet.
section.subtitle: Navigation while reading
section.p: You can move to next / previous page using several methods:

ul.li: Touch screen: flick up / down to scroll
Touch screen: tap right side of screen for next page, left side for previous page

section.p: Accessing menu
In reading mode, tap center of screen or press menu button to open reader menu.
You can move to previous screen using Menu / Back action or by two finger flick left to right.
To navigate by link, long tap on link. Links to manual sections: tap zones | reader menu | settings | main screen | file browser | about project
To return back after navigation by link, select Return action from menu, press Back key or two finger tap left top corner of screen.
In reading mode, screen is divided into a grid of 3 x 3 tap zones.

On Cool Reader start, Main Screen is shown. It contains following parts:

ul.li: Now Reading: currently opened or last opened book description at upper part of screen. Tap to open current (last) book.
Menu Button: button with Menu icon at top right corner - short press opens menu, long press opens settings.
Recently read books: list of recently read books is located below Now Reading section. Most recent book is at left. You can scroll this list using flick guesture. Tap on book cover to open book.

File System: contains list of icons to browse file system folders containing books. Usually it contains links to internal storage and SD card. If some book is opened, its directory is appended to this list, too. Tap on item to browse files and folders in this directory.

File System: contains list of icons to browse file system folders containing books. Usually it contains links to internal storage and SD card. If some book is opened, its directory is appended to this list, too.

Library: access book database by authors / series / title / filename. Author, series name and book title are being extracted from books when opening directory in Cool Reader file browser. Only certain formats have metadata (EPUB, MOBI, FB2).

section.p: By selecting folder from Main Screen / Browse File System section, you can view its contents using internal File Browser
You can see folders and books in folders.
By tapping on folder item, you will open this folder.
By tapping on book item, you will open book for reading.
Short tap on Back button at top left corner (or hardware Back button) brings you on previous screen (previous folder or Main Screen).
Long tap on Back button opens navigation menu with list of folders / screens to go.
Short tap on Menu button at top right corner (or hardware Menu button) opens menu.
Long tap on Menu button opens browser Settings.
